name: Keith Martin
testimonial: You can't put a price on the smiles on the faces of residents when they see these pictures and comments from their loved ones.

name: Daughter of resident
testimonial: What a wonderful idea this is. It is such a pleasure to sign in and see what is happening. It is so important.

name: Anne Marie Woods
testimonial: ADON's and CNM's find Altra user friendly. It is very easy to use and has saved us a lot of time dealing with staff. Overall very happy with Altra.

name: Orla O`Sullivan
testimonial: Altra has made such a difference when interacting with residents. For example, a resident whose conversation used to focus on pain no longer mentions it when viewing family photos and comments on the Family Newsletter. Altra has had such a positive impact on the Home.

name: Kiera Garrigan
testimonial: It`s great! Families get to see what the residents are up to and the activities they are involved with.

name: Jaison John
testimonial: It is simple to use for both staff and families. Itâ€™s a great tool to keep residents connected with their families, sharing photos of good memories in their life.
